## NgSelect interface


|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [initialized](./select.ngselect.initialized.md) | Observable&lt;boolean&gt; | Occurs every time when NgSelect is initialized or reinitialized, if value is false NgSelect was not initialized yet |
